resources.string: Renowned for creating memorable moments, Park Plaza caters to both leisure and business travellers with stylish guest rooms and versatile meeting facilities which are perfectly complemented by award-winning restaurants and bars. We present a wide choice of travel destinations and accommodation options, from vibrant city-centre hotels to tranquil beach-side resorts, all united by authentic service and modern, inviting spaces.
